header.title: Corbyn unveils ‘staggeringly hypocritical’ plan to teach kids about British Empire racism
header.subtitle: Jeremy Corbyn was accused of “staggering hypocrisy” over plans to lecture the country about racism despite anti-Semitism “poisoning” Labour under his leadership. Children would be taught about colonialism, injustice and the role of the British Empire as part of the national curriculum if he takes power.
header.owner: Sam Lister, Daily Express Deputy Political Editor
header.postText: 'The Labour leader will set out details of the plans at the launch of his party’s race and faith manifesto.', 'But former Labour minister Ian Austin, who quit the party over its handling of prejudice against Jews, said that the party should tackle racism within its ranks first.', 'He said: No one is going to listen to a lecture about racism from Jeremy Corbyn when Labour is the only party in history to be subjected to a full inquiry by the Equality and Human Rights Commission.', 'Instead of making speeches about these issues, he ought to be listening to the Jewish community, dealing with the anti - Semitism that has poisoned the Labour Party under his leadership and disowning the candidates who have said and done unacceptable things.', 'Labour’ s race plans would compel businesses to report on the pay gap faced by black, Asian and minority ethnic groups staff in order to stamp out discriminatory pay.', 'An emancipation educational trust would also be formed to ensure historical injustice, colonialism and role of the British empire is taught in the national curriculum.', 'The trust would also lecture on migration as well as how to address the legacy of slavery and teach how it interrupted a rich and powerful black history.', 'Mr Corbyn also wants to end charges for passports, visas and tests from the Home Office ', ' Home Secretary Priti Patel said not charging for visa and immigration services would cost more than£ 1.5 billion. ', 'It's staggering that Corbyn's Labour see fit to lecture people about race and faith while they are investigated by the Equality and Human Rights Commission for the rampant anti-Semitism in their ranks, she added.', 'Mr Corbyn faced an exodus of MPs over his failures to tackle anti - Semitism in his party. ', 'Ahead of his speech, he said: Labour is the party of equality and human rights. Our race and faith manifesto presents our unshakeable commitment to challenge the inequalities and discrimination that has faced too many communities.', ' Whatever your background, wherever you are from, whatever your faith or religious belief, you should have the chance to use your talents to fulfil your potential.Labour will tackle head on the barriers that have unfairly held back so many people and communities.'

commentThread.commentText: Frederick Douglass was most impressed with the colour blindness of the British. In all public conveyances, inns and restaurants he was received on equal terms with whites. In contrast to the United States where he was caricatured, scoffed, scorned, mocked and maltreated with impunity by anyone with a white skin. In England he met nothing to remind me of my complexion. He discovered that the British measure and esteem men according to their moral and intellectual worth, and not according to the color of their skin. While in England he raised $710 and purchased his freedom which he was unable to find in white America, the plans he had for the future could only be carried out by a free man! In 1845 his two year lecture tour here was received with enormous praise and popularity, often speaking for two hours, sometimes to thousands of people who would line up to shake his hand after each event. Here he was able to denounce the Englishmen acting in concert with southern slave holders, stress human brotherhood and argue that slavery was the common enemy of mankind. This will not help the Marxist lectures Corbyn has in mind and the bondage he will project onto us as a result

How about teaching them that we were the greatest Empire the world has ever seen, civilising India, Thailand and many other parts of the world. The greatest trading nation the world has seen and the country that gave the world the Industrial revolution. All these countries are still incredibly grateful about what we did for them as I have found out from my working life travelling the world as an engineer. The greatest inventions and discoveries have come from this country. Todays youth and all the people educated by the left wing teachers at schools and Universities also need some of these truths exlaining to them all the good we did as well as the bad things we did. I 'm sick of these people and wish they would get out of my country, the greatest country in the world. Why is it illegal immigrants and asylum seekers pass through many european countries which are safe to get here ?

replies.commentText: Empire made it possible for many Britons to emigrate to an eventually better life, though Australian bush fires and Canadian winters are calling this into question these days.

commentThread.commentText: No doubt the 'lessons' to our innocent children will focus on Africa. It is ridiculous for anyone to attribute Africa's current ills to colonialism. Many prosperous democracies began as colonies, including Australia, Canada, New Zealand and the US. Moreover, their success stems entirely from their own efforts to overcome adversity. Unlike Mr.Corbyn I have been to many countries in Africa.On a number of occasions I have been told by locals that they wish the British would come back, especially in Sudan, Kenya, Nigeria, Ghana and Gambia. This is because, since these and other countries have gained independence, they have been beset by corruption, oppression, failure of public services, infiltration of terrorism, military posturing, etc. It is the evils of socialism that should be taught to children.
There is racism towards white people in their own country, take Rotherham for example.

All far left groups have kept power by offering numerous freebies to bribe voters at their own expense. Once in power they then indoctrinate the young through their education policy.Labour will scrap Ofsted so there is no independent organisation checking on what they are doing.How will we know how well a school is doing ? Give the young the vote and keep power.They are attacking groups in our society.Who will be next ?

Corbyn just oozes negativity and despair. Why does he hate just about anything that reflects success, prosperity and ambition. What a dire miserable country this would be with him and rabble in charge. And why are the decent, moderate party MPs there are a few actually out there campaigning for these crackpot ideas?

Doesn't this idiot know that the only reason that he is able to oppose everything we stand for in this fabulous free speaking country , is that he is able to do just that because of our past history that has brought us to this stage . Which is the envy of the rest of the world .
Mr Corbyn want's to practice what he says here seen as anti semitism is rife in the Labour party.
That’s how communism works first change history and it’s easier now they have the BBC and channel 4 to indoctrinate the people

The man is a traitor who appears to have no moral compass or allegiance the country he was born in. He is the stuff of spy story of an embedded sleeper who becomes PM. If it wasn't so serious it would be farcical!
After more than 30 years in Parliament has it never occurred to Corbyn why Labour hasn't ever tried to introduce his far-left policies?

He needs to understand along with many others that the world was a different place,we were less enlightened as humans. Must we keep paying for the mistakes of our ruleing classes forever? Will people never let any old grudges rest? What about the Roman Empire ,Mongols and other races who have been pretty widespread and dominant over other less advanced civilizations? Can we get recompense for the so called Vikings who enslaved the people of this land, our own ruling classed who seized land from the common people in the enclosures act ? No that wont you think win yo u b rowni>e points with the uneducated.
And teach them the evils of communism too. How many poor souls did Stalin murder?

Is he going to teach children about the role of the Arab Mislium in the slave trade, and how this had been going of for centuries before the white man ever got involved in the transport side of it ?   Is he going to teach that the trade continues in slightly different form ?  Is he going to teach that even Muscular Christian Missionaries were appalled at what they found when they first visited and had to work hard to stamp out  ritual slaughter and sacrifice, and cannibalism ?  Is he going to teach that we had to show people a wheel ?   Or is he going to bang on about the Great Zimbabwe demonstrating how advanced the civilisation was ?  [It is a dry stone wall, built around 1400. Durham Cathedral was built in 900.  The Tower of London in 1068]
And I ask how did this bag of sht become MP let alone Leader of the Labour Party most of whom don't and have never really laboured?
Mi6 should be pulling corbyns lot in for questioning
Great idea. Children taught how to hate their own country, heritage and culture and potentially foment terrorism.
A good way to buy votes....Not mine, but  in certain areas I am certainly in a minority. The man is nuts.
The more Corbyn talks, the deeper he digs his hole. Carry on Jeremy you're doing a sterling job, you'll soon be in China.
this is to please Dianne Abbot, right?

If Corbyn is saying that colonialism was based on exploitation, power, greed, racism and plunder then okay, but that story and that era needs considerable study to truly understand the motivations and circumstances.
